entries.title: Hi-Fi Rush review
entries.description: An impressive, beat-based action game that loses most of its impact by the end.

entries.title: The Last of Us star Nick Offerman swore off videogames forever after becoming obsessed with this Nintendo 64 game
entries.description: The dopamine drip was a little too good for his own good.

entries.title: Sims 4 trans-inclusive update faces culture war backlash in record time
entries.description: I am tired of Earth. These people. I am tired of being caught in the tangle of their lives.

entries.title: Back 4 Blood won't get any more new content as Turtle Rock pivots to an all-new game
entries.description: The co-op zombie shooter is done, but something new is coming.

entries.title: Starfield release date speculation has eclipsed everything else about the RPG
entries.description: Rumors keep swirling. Bethesda remains silent. The vacuum of information has been filled with speculation.

entries.title:
The Day Before gameplay reveal actually happened, and it was as bizarre as you'd 
expect
entries.description: We finally got a new look at the highly anticipated zombie survival game. It was not good.

entries.title: Play Counter-Strike 1.6 in your browser
entries.description: Greetings comrade we are Valvski Software.

entries.title: The next Sims 4 expansion is threatening me with making family memories
entries.description: Alongside the infants update in March, the Growing Together expansion is adding new activities for families.

entries.title: Overwatch 2's new Antarctic map has ice drills, fishing, and immortal penguins
entries.description: Season 3's new Control map brings new locations and snow tech to the FPS.

entries.title: 6 games that had a huge impact on PC gaming, but are rarely celebrated today
entries.description: The unsung trailblazers of PC gaming history.

entries.title: This 'professional' end-of-the-world simulator is now available on Steam
entries.description: Nuclear War Simulator is a bit like Kerbal Space Program, only it's about nuclear annihilation and not technically a game.

entries.title: We now know the massive changes coming to Destiny 2's DPS meta in Lightfall
entries.description: Thanks, linears. You had a hell of a run.

entries.title: LG's latest tech could fix the biggest problem with gaming OLEDs
entries.description: Brightness could shoot up all without demanding lots more power. The secret sauce is LG's META Technology.

entries.title: That time Among Us accidentally violated the Geneva Conventions
entries.description: We've all been there.

entries.title: Seriously, where did you lot get the money for all those RTX 4090s?
entries.description: The top Nvidia card has popped into the Steam Hardware Survey above all of AMD's high-end RX 6000-series GPUs. And they've been around for years.

entries.title: The Apocalypse has never been more relaxing in tinyBuild’s new cozy base builder
entries.description: Base building has never been more relaxing or enjoyable in this quirky, cozy post-apocalyptic survival game.

entries.title: Fans huff the copium as Platinum Games teases MGR:Revengeance's 10th anniversary
entries.description: Let 'er rip, Jack.

entries.title: An error in Samsung's 980 Pro firmware is causing SSDs to die. I'd check your drive right now tbh
entries.description: Update or say goodbye to your Samsung SSD. If only that was the only issue affecting its drives today, but...

entries.title: Meta lost more than 4 billion dollars on the metaverse in the last financial quarter
entries.description: Zuck me.

entries.title: Dwarf Fortress releases sales figures since Steam release showing 46,000% increase in earnings
entries.description: I'm not a finance guy, but I think that's good.

entries.title: Where to get Happy Pet Snacks in World of Warcraft
entries.description: You'll need five for one of the Trading Post objectives.

entries.title: At long last, the Steam Deck UI has replaced Steam's Big Picture mode
entries.description: No longer will I crash the app by accidentally tabbing over to my friends list.

entries.title: PC Gamer UK March issue on sale now: System Shock reborn!
entries.description: Plus: Dwarf Fortress, Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, Park Beyond, Crisis Core, The Cosiest Games on PC, and much more!

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #593, February 2
entries.description: Help with the #593 puzzle if you need it.

entries.title: Ubisoft's launcher broke Steam games on Linux and Steam Deck
entries.description: Ah yes, a third-party launcher making everyone's lives much better as usual.

entries.title: Amnesia: The Bunker delayed into May after a 'tough winter'
entries.description: The open world, player choice-driven instalment will now hit on May 16.

entries.title: EA has reportedly canceled a singleplayer Apex Legends game
entries.description: The game was apparently the one announced by former creative director Mohammad Alavi in 2021.
